parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>The provided post does not contain a CMF number.  While the absence of a CMF number doesn't automatically exclude it from being electoral propaganda, it suggests it might not be directly linked to an officially registered candidate's campaign.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>The post mentions "#echipa Valeriu Iftime". While not explicitly naming a candidate, it strongly implies support for a team associated with a person named Valeriu Iftime.  This needs further investigation to determine if Valeriu Iftime is a candidate in the parliamentary elections. If he is, this would satisfy Article 36 (7) - a.</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>The post is a paid Facebook advertisement, inherently targeting a wide audience. The use of hashtags like #voceadorohoi and #Dorohoi further suggests an attempt to reach a broad segment of the population in the Dorohoi area. This satisfies Article 36 (7) - c.</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>The phrase "o soluție sănătoasă pentru viitorul județului nostru" ("a healthy solution for the future of our county") suggests a positive endorsement of Valeriu Iftime's team. The overall tone and context strongly imply an intention to influence voters towards supporting this team. This satisfies Article 36 (7) - c.  The objective is clearly to promote a particular political entity.</electoral-objective>
<journalism>The post does not present itself as journalistic in nature. It lacks objective reporting, analysis, or diverse perspectives. Instead, it presents a clear opinion and endorsement, lacking the neutrality expected from journalistic content.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>The post goes beyond expressing a personal opinion; it actively promotes a specific political entity, aiming to sway public opinion in its favor.  It's not a personal reflection but a campaign-style message.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>949234727252215</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The post, while not explicitly mentioning a specific party, strongly promotes "echipa Valeriu Iftime."  If Valeriu Iftime is a candidate in the parliamentary elections, the post fulfills all criteria of Article 36 (7) of LEGE nr. 334 din 17 iulie 2006, constituting electoral propaganda. The paid nature of the Facebook post, its broad targeting, and its clear endorsement of a political entity point towards an intention to influence the election outcome.  The absence of a CMF number is a mitigating factor, but not sufficient to negate the promotional nature of the post.  The post's timing is crucial; if it was published after the official end of the electoral campaign, it would be a clear violation of Article 98 t) of LEGE nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>TRUE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates>
  <candidate><name>Valeriu Iftime</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
</electoral-propaganda-candidates>
<responsible-party-or-group>Vocea Dorohoi</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police>
Vocea Dorohoi, pentru încălcarea articolului 98 t) din LEGEA nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015, prin publicarea unei postări plătite pe Facebook după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, cu ID-ul 949234727252215, care promovează indirect echipa lui Valeriu Iftime, având un efect electoral pozitiv asupra acestuia. Postarea, deși nu menționează explicit un partid, îndeplinește toate criteriile materialului de propagandă electorală conform articolului 36 (7) din LEGE nr. 334 din 17 iulie 2006, prin referirea directă la o echipă politică, adresarea către o audiență largă din județul Botoșani și obiectivul clar de a influența votul în favoarea acesteia.  Textul "o soluție sănătoasă pentru viitorul județului nostru" evidențiază intenția de a influența electoratul.  Chiar dacă nu există un număr CMF, caracterul promoțional al postării, vizibilitatea sa extinsă (3K-4K impresii, 100K-500K reach estimat) și cheltuielile financiare (sub 100 RON) confirmă intenția de a influența alegerile.  Contactul poate fi stabilit prin office@voceadorohoi.ro sau +40759112233.
</message-for-police>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
